safetyPage.tagline: Your safety is our top priority.
safetyPage.title: Safety Features Designed to Exceed Expectations
safetyPage.description: We're excited to introduce our SOS feature, launching in phases. First, you'll experience the MVP version as part of our Safety Kit in the app. When you're on a trip, simply tap the SOS button to activate it. Here's what happens next:
safetyPage.benefitsTitle: Discover the benefits of our SOS feature when it's activated!
safetyPage.benefit1: Every SMS message sent will contain the precise, real-time location of the driver, ensuring that recipients can track their whereabouts accurately.
safetyPage.benefit2: Nearby drivers, within a 5KM range, will get an SMS notification.
safetyPage.benefit3: As soon as the driver adds emergency contacts, each one will instantly receive a text message, ensuring they are promptly informed and ready to assist.
safetyPage.benefit4: When the SOS feature is activated, the Efoyy team will try to reach the driver. If they can't connect, the app will:
safetyPage.benefit4Item1: Send the driver's location via SMS every 30 seconds.
safetyPage.benefit4Item2: Alert nearby drivers with the driver's exact location.

contactPage.title: Get in Touch
contactPage.description: Have questions about our safety features or need assistance? We're here to help. Reach out to our team using any of the methods below.
contactPage.name: Your Name

contactPage.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error with your submission. Please try again later.

hero.title: Drive & Earn On Your Schedule
hero.description: Join thousands of drivers who've found freedom and financial opportunity with RideShare. Set your own hours and be your own boss.

benefits.title: Why Drive With Us?
benefits.description: RideShare offers the flexibility, earnings, and support you need to succeed on your own terms.

flexibility.title: Flexible Schedule
flexibility.description: Drive whenever you want. No minimum hours or schedules to follow.
flexibility.item2: Drive during peak hours for maximum earnings
flexibility.item3: Take time off whenever you need it

earnings.title: Competitive Earnings
earnings.description: Keep more of what you earn with our driver-friendly commission structure.
earnings.item2: Weekly direct deposits to your bank account

protection.title: Driver Protection
protection.description: We've got your back with comprehensive insurance and safety features.
protection.item1: Insurance coverage while on the platform
protection.item3: Safety features built into the driver app

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Getting started is easy. Be on the road and earning in just a few simple steps.

step1.title: 1. Sign Up
step1.description: Complete our simple online application process

step2.title: 2. Get Verified
step2.description: Pass a background check and vehicle inspection

step3.title: 3. Go Online
step3.description: Turn on the app when you're ready to accept rides

step4.title: 4. Start Earning
step4.description: Get paid weekly with direct deposit to your bank

app.title: Powerful Driver App
app.description: Our driver app is designed to make your experience seamless and profitable.

feature1.title: Smart Navigation
feature1.description: Turn-by-turn directions and traffic updates in real-time

feature2.title: Destination Filters
feature2.description: Set your destination and get rides heading your way

feature3.title: Earnings Tracker
feature3.description: Monitor your earnings and trips in real-time

feature4.title: Driver Rewards
feature4.description: Earn points for consistent service and unlock benefits
